resources.string: I have been a prey to missing out on important opportunities simply because I wasn\'t aware of their existence. This initiative is to help all college students out there never to miss important job listings from top-notch companies
To request job updates about companies not mentioned in company filter, to contribute or inform about missing job postings or to join this initiative drop an email or connect with us on LinkedIn
An initiative to help all college students out there never to miss important job listings from top-notch companies
You can login to the app using Facebook or Google login to access bookmarked jobs on the website and receive customised job update emails
